title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 43-2.13 - Continuing eligibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 43-2.13 - Continuing eligibility

State Regulations
(a) Participants may be required to establish periodically that they remain eligible for the program. (b) The applicant/participant must notify the department immediately of any changes in circumstances that may affect eligibility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
43-2.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
